'''David Potts''' (born on 15 July 1970 in [[Farnworth|Farnworth, Lancashire]]<!---in 1970 Farnworth was then still part of Lancashire, its now part of Greater Manchester--->, [[UK]]), known to bandmates and fans as "'''Pottsy'''", is the ex-frontman of [[Monaco (band)|Monaco]].
'''David Potts''' (born on 15 July 1970 in [[Farnworth|Farnworth, Lancashire]]<!---in 1970 Farnworth was then still part of Lancashire, its now part of Greater Manchester--->, [[UK]]), known to bandmates and fans as "'''Pottsy'''", is the ex-frontman of [[Monaco (band)|Monaco]].
